assignments.name: Assign_party_values_0_0
assignments.label: Update party to junior policy holder

assignments.description: Sets new values for the household party as part of the state transition.
assignments.name: Set_new_household_party_values
assignments.label: Set new household party values

assignments.description: Sets the party state to verifying give this party was in prospect but now TOB have been signed.
assignments.name: Set_new_party_state
assignments.label: Set new party state

assignments.name: Update_party_state_to_cancel_onboarding
assignments.label: Update party state to cancel onboarding

decisions.name: What_is_the_status_of_the_household_currently
decisions.label: What is the status of the household currently

decisions.name: What_status_is_the_account_currently
decisions.label: What status is the account currently

Flow.description: This flow can be called by other flows mentioning specific events that have occurred. This flow will evaluate that event and determine if a change in party state is required. See Notion for guidance on the different event types.
Flow.label: Account | Party state manager

subflows.description: Calls the sub-flow that controls the actions that occur off the back of a transition from prospect to verifying.
subflows.name: Trigger_state_change_actions
subflows.label: Trigger state change actions

variables.description: Provided as an input, this confirms what even has occurred - e.g. AML passed, TOB signed.
variables.name: eventType

variables.description: Stores the account/party record that this event relates to.
variables.name: party

variables.description: Where a party record cannot be provided, this flow will accept a party ID which can be used to look up the party record.
variables.name: partyId
